queries.query: undead creature that can climb walls and inflict necrotic damage
queries.variant: undead monster that inflicts necrotic damage and can climb walls

queries.query: medium zombie that uses webbing and has low Dexterity
queries.variant: zombie that is medium-sized and has low Dexterity while using webbing

queries.variant: creature that has undead traits and abilities similar to spiders

queries.variant: undead that is weak but tricky, able to trap targets in webbing

queries.variant: zombie that can revive from 0 hit points and can freely move through webs
